activities: Vangent provides a wide variety of services and solutions to our clients that (a) facilitate the selection, hiring and internal mobility of individual candidates for specific employment and (b) include a wide range of multi-channel contact center services. Vangent receives personal data from the EU when providing these services but only in its capacity as a data processor on behalf of its clients. Vangent also receives personal data concerning its own employees who reside in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
Vangent commits to the Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc. BBB EU Safe Harbor dispute resolution mechanism (Web: www.bbb.org/us, Email: eusafeharbor@council.bbb.org)

For human resources data, Vangent commits to cooperate and comply with the European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) in the investigation and resolution of unresolved compliants brought under the U.S.-EU Safe Harbor Framework.
